headline: Is It Time To Reassess AppLovin (APP) After Recent Share Price Pullback
summary: If you are wondering whether AppLovin's current share price really reflects what the business is worth, you are not alone. A closer look at its valuation story can help you frame that question. At a last close of US$444.93, the stock has seen an 8.0% gain over the past week, an 18.1% decline over the past month, a 28.0% decline year to date, but a 38.8% return over the past year and a very large gain over three years. Recent headlines have focused on AppLovin's position in mobile app...

headline: Assessing Whether AppLovin (APP) Looks Undervalued After Recent Share Price Pullback
summary: AppLovin (APP) is back on many investors’ screens after a sharp pullback in recent trading, prompting a closer look at how its current share price lines up with recent returns and fundamentals. headline: 2 Nasdaq 100 Stocks with Exciting Potential and 1 We Question
summary: While the Nasdaq 100 (^NDX) is filled with cutting-edge technology and consumer companies, not all are on solid footing. Some are dealing with declining demand, high costs, or regulatory pressures that could limit future upside.

headline: Wall Street Sees Major Upside in These 4 Beaten-Down Tech Stocks — Is the Selloff Overdone?
summary: Four high-profile tech stocks have shed between 23% and 37% of their value so far in 2026, even as the Nasdaq 100 sits nearly flat on the year. Wall Street’s analyst community hasn’t followed the market lower, and the gap between where these stocks trade and where analysts think they belong has grown wide enough ...
